title: I have the third highest kayn masteries in oce and top 80 in the world ama.
body:
And im very quickly approaching first in oce and top 20 world.

I lied, this isnt an ama, its a not so humblebrag/wheredidmylifegowrong post.

replies.body: I was the first one in oce to get level 5 with camile and highest mastery in the world. Now i dont play her at all. :) good sht

Wow!!! Very well done :D

...even if it only takes ~20 games to get there at the moment xDDDD

But seriously, well done. Not many can say that about any champion. I'm also glad you've found an interest in LoL besides spamming toxic posts xD

50 games to reach 3rd but still.

probably couldve gotten there faster if i had started already knowing how to play the champ since a grades get you around 1k points a pop.

wouldve gotten there in 34 games that way.

Im still a solid 40-50 games away from number 1 world though, things should die down when people stop being so hyped about him, ill still be playing him long after that though, hes soooooo fucking good for my playstyle, like i used to think akali was the perfect champion back when she had spell vamp, she had everything mobility, sustain, decent enough damage, scaled well with items, and all this was gated by a trash tier early game that you could just use skill to make up for.

Then she got reworked and lost her sustain in extended trades.

But in walks darkin form kayn, same shitty early game as a laner, same method of overcoming it, but after that 8-12 minute mark when youve transformed, ooooo doggy your taking people to dumpster town.

Oh that adc thats somewhat fed is skirting the edge of their auto attack range, animation cancel your w with flash into a point blank q pop your tiamat punch them in the face and hey ult them for good measure.

What adc?

And the mere fact that to be able to pull off a play like that you have to know the range of your point blank q in relation to where you will be upon flashing your w makes it so much better because it rewards you for knowing the champion.
